sentences.english: Improving and ameliorating the ability of Loran-C for time service are the main objective of our study in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本論文的主要研究目的是提高和改進羅蘭C授時能力。

sentences.english: The next time Sun met his professor, both of them were on foot.
sentences.chinese: 後來，孫再次遇到那位教授時，兩人都是步行。

sentences.english: This is the National Time Service Center.
sentences.chinese: 這裏啊，是國家授時中心。

sentences.english: Prof. Luo is a man of his word.
sentences.chinese: 羅教授時一個守信用的人。

sentences.english: Digital modulation technology is the foundation of BPL time code broadcast and independent time service.
sentences.chinese: 數字調製技術是BPL時碼發播和自主授時的基礎。

sentences.english: The first telephone time service system in china has been set up in Shanxi Astronomy Observatory.
sentences.chinese: 陝西天文臺已經建成我國第一個電話授時系統。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a novel GPS redundant time service method.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種新型GPS冗餘授時方法。

sentences.english: Moreover, some technical problems to improve HF skywave timing accuracy are also discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還討論了提高短波授時精度的某些技術措施。

definition: variant of 曆法|历法 calendar
Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479), with capital at Nanjing
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
Zou Yan (305-240 BC), founder of the School of Yin-Yang of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)

Lü Buwei (?291-235 BC), merchant and politician of the State of Qin 秦國|秦国[Qin2 guo2], subsequent Qin Dynasty 秦代[Qin2 dai4] Chancellor, allegedly the father of Ying Zheng 嬴政[Ying2 Zheng4], who subsequently became the first emperor Qin Shihuang 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]
forged book/book of dubious authenticity/misattributed book/Apocrypha
to be in overall charge/to oversee
